## Home Office controlled drugs (export)
You need a licence to export controlled drugs. Read the guidance for [controlled drugs import and export licencing](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/controlled-drugs-import-and-export-licences).

## Home Office pre-cursor chemical export authorisation
You need authorisation from the Home Office to export precursor chemicals. Read the guidance for [precursor chemical licencing](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/precursor-chemical-licensing).

## Home Office pre-cursor chemical import authorisation
You need authorisation from the Home Office to import precursor chemicals. Read the guidance for [precursor chemical licencing](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/precursor-chemical-licensing).

## Home Office controlled drugs (import)
You need a licence to import controlled drugs. Read the guidance for [controlled drugs import and export licencing](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/controlled-drugs-import-and-export-licences).
